variables.demodb_query_1_sql: MATCH {Class: Profiles, as: profile, where: (Name='Santo' AND Surname='OrientDB')}-HasFriend-{Class: Profiles, as: friend}
variables.demodb_query_1_return_browse: RETURN friend.@Rid as Friend_RID, friend.Name as Friend_Name, friend.Surname as Friend_Surname
variables.demodb_query_2_text: Find Santo's Friends who are also Customers
variables.demodb_query_2_sql: MATCH {Class: Profiles, as: profile, where: (Name='Santo' AND Surname='OrientDB')}-HasFriend-{Class: Profiles, as: friend}< -HasProfile-{class: Customers, as: customer}
variables.demodb_query_2_return_browse: RETURN friend.@Rid as Friend_RID, friend.Name as Friend_Name, friend.Surname as Friend_Surname, customer.@Rid as Customer_RID, customer.OrderedId as Customer_OrederedId
variables.demodb_query_3_text: Find Santo's Friends who are also Customers, and the Countries they are from
variables.demodb_query_3_sql: MATCH {Class: Profiles, as: profile, where: (Name='Santo' AND Surname='OrientDB')}-HasFriend-{Class: Profiles, as: friend}< -HasProfile-{class: Customers, as: customer}-IsFromCountry->{Class: Countries, as: country}
variables.demodb_query_3_return_browse: RETURN friend.@Rid as Friend_RID, friend.Name as Friend_Name, friend.Surname as Friend_Surname, customer.@Rid as Customer_RID, customer.OrderedId as Customer_OrederedId, country.Name as FriendIsFrom
